text: Kɨ kamaghɨn me mɨgei, “Ia ti fo, Israelian Atrivim Solomon, kantrin igharazibar amizibar ikia, egha bizir kam bangɨn arazir bar kurabar irɨ. Guizbangɨra, God bar Solomon gifongegha a gamizɨ, an atrivimɨn oto. Egha kantrin igharazibar atriviba bar men tongɨn, an fofozim bar ekevegha bar me gafira. Ezɨ, gumaka, a uabɨ, kantrin igharazibar amizibar iti, ezɨma me a getuima, an arazir kurabagh ami.
